item.title: Belgian Venture Capital & Private Equity Association Members List
Betagroup Presentation Template to Pitch to Investors
Europe’s Blooming Tech Entrepreneurs
item.description: The two things that struck me the most were:?? The seed and start-up venture capital structure in Europe. The shocking list of the barriers to entrepreneurship index made by the OECD. Italy, Spain and Sweden have lower barriers than the USA. It has also left me thinking about the Venture Capital divide. Great food for thought.

item.title: Beta Group’s Internet Entrepreneurship Links
item.description: In case you do not know about it, the Beta Group is the largest Internet & Tech entrepreneurship networking event in Belgium, with about 350 attendees in each of its monthly meetups. The event consists of a pitch slam with six startups showcasing their products, short requests and announcements from the audience (the live tweets), and lots of networking over free warm beer. A must. Disclosure: I am a member of the Beta Group’s council, and proud of it!

item.title: Fred Destin’s Workshop on Hacking Venture Capital
Three things you should never tell a VC when fundraising – Fred Destin
item.description: Fred Destin is a VC I follow since I saw his brilliant participation in this roundtable at Plugg in Brussels: VC Panel: Where’s The Money Gone? from Plugg Conference on Vimeo. He was completely detached at the beginning, but thanks to the arts of Matthäus Krzykowski he ended up getting fully into it and providing for one of the best moments of the conference.
